snippet: Rajeev Ram of the United States upset fourth-seeded Grigor Dimitrov of Bulgaria, and Sam Querrey beat Juan Martín del Potro of Argentina....
lead_paragraph: Rajeev Ram of the United States upset fourth-seeded Grigor Dimitrov of Bulgaria, and Sam Querrey beat Juan Martín del Potro of Argentina.

headline.print_headline: A Shocker Helps Set Up an All-American Final
headline.main: A Shocker Helps Set Up an All-American Final in Delray Beach

abstract: Rajeev Ram defeats Grigor Dimitrov in semifinals of Delray Beach Open tennis tournament; other tennis matches noted.
